dmca.title: [EV1-C1313224I] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, October 11, 2006 10:35 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1313224I] Copyright Infringement Subject: [EV1-C1313224I] Copyright Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright Infringement Added by system at Wednesday, Oct 11 2006 02:09 pm X-MailFrom: adepi.internet@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Oct 11 15:07:02 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 11 Oct 2006 15:07:02 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 11 Oct 2006 15:07:02 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from adepi.internet@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GXkM2-0007Zy-E8 for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 15:07:02 -0500 Received: from nf-out-0910.google.com ([64.233.182.190]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from adepi.internet@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GXkLj-000NFY-GI for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 15:06:43 -0500 Received: by nf-out-0910.google.com with SMTP id y25so897571nfb for ; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 13:06:11 -0700 (PDT) DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=beta; d=gmail.com; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=LL1/BWAPlo6Q5QdDsxnsud/qviThdtrSlqb/qJRCihtvQZv5tpZj+n7J7wXoIqv2Jc47UIpG3v1LztMZZSFASUSrJGsm7ASsHimK25eG1c8zy1rJvT5g48ik9tcPyZs9wWwBdWoePGcPCweahGsxgYpYh79tt0b/hz2y140cUNA= Received: by 10.48.202.19 with SMTP id z19mr3751248nff; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 13:06:11 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.49.36.14 with HTTP; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 13:06:11 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <411e9ea50610111306k3c34a160o45b7bd234e03b360@mail.gmail.com> Date: Wed, 11 Oct 2006 17:06:11 -0300 From: "Adepi - Departamento de Internet" To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: Copyright Infringement MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_31721_15372532.1160597171181" Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 64.233.182.190 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.182.190; envelope-from=adepi.internet@gmail.com; helo=nf-out-0910.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Oct 2006 20:07:02.0296 (UTC) FILETIME=[D0DDE180:01C6ED70] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) *Dear Provider* ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who represents the following motion picture production and distribution companies: *Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. - Sony Pictures Disney Enterprises, Inc. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc. Paramount Pictures Corporation TriStar Pictures, Inc. Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation United Artists Pictures, Inc. United Artists Corporation Universal City Studios, LLLP Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.* We have received information that you are apparently providing Internet access to and possibly hosting pirate material at url: http://www.maniatorrent.com/ which is offering downloads of copyrighted motion picture. The distribution of unauthorized copies of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Brazilian Copyright Law # 9610/98 and Criminal Code, section 184. This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations. If this information were conffirmed we request that you do the following: 1) Disable access to this site; 2) Remove this site from your server; and 3) Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement. By copy of this letter, the owner of the above-referenced Internet site and/or email account is hereby directed to cease and desist from the conduct complained of herein. On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, that we have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law. Also, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification. Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email should you have any questions. We thank you for your cooperation in this matter. Your prompt response is requested. Respectfully -- ADEPI - Associação de Defesa da Propriedade Intelectual Departamento de Internet www.adepi.org.br Tel (11) 3826-7479 Fax (11) 3828-1559 MIME element (text/html) Dear Provider

ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who represents the following motion picture production and distribution companies:

Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. - Sony Pictures
Disney Enterprises, Inc.
Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc.
Paramount Pictures Corporation
TriStar Pictures, Inc.
Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
United Artists Pictures, Inc.
United Artists Corporation
Universal City Studios, LLLP
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.


We have received information that you are apparently providing Internet access to and possibly hosting pirate material at url:

http://www.maniatorrent.com/

which is offering downloads of copyrighted motion picture. The distribution of unauthorized copies of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Brazilian Copyright Law # 9610/98 and Criminal Code, section 184. This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations.

If this information were conffirmed we request that you do the following:

1) Disable access to this site;
2) Remove this site from your server; and
3) Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement.

By copy of this letter, the owner of the above-referenced Internet site and/or email account is hereby directed to cease and desist from the conduct complained of herein.

On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, that we have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law.


Also, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification.

Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email should you have any questions.

We thank you for your cooperation in this matter.  Your prompt response is requested.

Respectfully


--
ADEPI - Associação de Defesa da Propriedade Intelectual
Departamento de Internet
www.adepi.org.br
Tel  (11) 3826-7479  
Fax (11) 3828-1559
